prompt_variants.variant_name: Primary - MAMMA - HUMAN TEETH HORROR 8 SECONDS
prompt_variants.subject: The lamb children calling "Mamma" but through sheep vocal cords it comes out wrong - "Maaaaaaa-maaaa" - while camera close on their mouths showing human teeth, tongues, dental development of 7 and 5-year-old humans in lamb skulls.

Or were always sheep thinking they were children? Both? GuÃ°rÃºn-ewe tries to comfort, nuzzles them with sheep snout. But tears from horizontal pupils. Human tears from sheep eyes. They huddle together. Three sheep in children's clothes. Family still family. Love still love. But wrong bodies. Or right bodies, wrong consciousness? Which is true?
